title: Implement Plan Phase - Decomposition + Ship It
description: Wire up the Plan phase: AI-assisted feature decomposition from PRD, Plan markdown generation, beads epic/gate task creation, dependency graph visualization, Ship It! button that closes gate tasks. See PRD Section 7.2.
close_reason: Implemented Plan Phase: AI decomposition, Plan markdown, beads epic/gate, dependency graph visualization, Ship It! and Re-ship buttons

title: Implement login endpoint
close_reason: Implemented login endpoint: POST /api/v1/auth/login with JWT, bcrypt validation, auth config at ~/.opensprint/auth.json

title: User should be able to drag to change the percent width of the screen that's allocated to chat vs the PRD in the design tab
Agent context assembly
description: Build the context assembly pipeline: gather relevant PRD sections, Plan markdown, and upstream task diffs/summaries into the .opensprint/active/<task-id>/ directory structure. See PRD Section 12.2.

title: UI component - active agents list across all tabs
description: Component in navbar or sidebar showing list of currently running agents (phase, label). Poll API or subscribe to WebSocket. Visible when any agents active, or always with empty state.

title: Human-in-the-Loop approval system
description: Implement the HIL system: WebSocket-based approval requests, frontend approval UI, orchestrator pause/resume on pending approvals, per-category notification modes. See PRD Section 6.5.

title: Plan approval gate
close_reason: Plan approval gate: filter gate tasks from orchestrator ready queue so agents never pick them up; gate closed by user Ship it! only

title: Instrument Plan phase with agent registry
description: When Plan phase invokes planning agent (chat, decomposition, Ship-it PRD update), register before invoke and unregister in finally. Phase: plan, descriptive label.

title: API endpoint GET /projects/:id/agents/active
description: Return array of active agents: id, phase, label, startedAt. Aggregates from ActiveAgentsService and orchestrator state.

title: Implement Validate Phase - Feedback mapping
description: Wire up the Validate phase: feedback submission, AI categorization (bug/feature/ux/scope), mapping to Plan epics, automatic ticket creation, PRD update proposals for scope changes. See PRD Section 7.4.

title: Active agents registry - show all running agents across Design, Plan, Build, Validate
description: Implement a unified view of all agents currently running across Design, Plan, Build, and Validate phases. Currently only Build orchestrator tracks agents; Design/Plan/Validate use fire-and-forget invoke() with no central registry. Epic covers: ActiveAgentsService, instrumentation of all phases, API endpoint, WebSocket events, and UI component.

title: GAP_ANALYSIS: PRD Implementation Gaps
description: Epic tracking all missing/incomplete functionality from GAP_ANALYSIS.md. See GAP_ANALYSIS.md for full context.

title: Project dropdown selector
description: Navbar project name should be a dropdown listing all projects for rapid switching. PRD §6.1
close_reason: Implemented project dropdown selector in navbar per PRD §6.1

title: Dependency context propagation
description: Collect diffs/summaries from completed dependency tasks for context assembly. PRD §7.3.2

title: PRD updates on scope-change feedback
description: After HIL approval for scope change, invoke agent to update PRD. PRD §7.4.2, §15.1

title: HIL request/response flow
description: Emit hil.request from orchestrator; handle hil.respond; show approval UI. WebSocket has TODO.

title: Fix feedback to epic mapping
description: Resolve mappedPlanId (plan ID) to beadEpicId for discovered-from dependency. PRD §14

title: PRD click-to-focus
description: Click PRD section to add context to next chat message. PRD §7.1.5

title: PRD direct edit
description: Inline edit PRD with sync to conversation context. PRD §7.1.5

title: PRD history UI
description: View change log and diffs. API exists at GET /prd/history. PRD §7.1.2

title: Test execution in orchestrator
description: Run test command after coding phase as sanity check. PRD §7.3.2, §8.3

title: Custom CLI command input
description: Setup UI field when Custom agent selected. PRD §6.3

title: Expo.dev integration
description: EAS Build config, OTA updates, preview deployments. PRD §6.4

title: Add Plan flow
description: Modal/form for creating plans. Add Plan button has no handler. PRD §7.2.4

title: Custom deployment trigger
description: Webhook or command after Build completion. PRD §6.4

title: Test framework detection
description: Detect or let user select test framework during setup. PRD §10.2

title: Overall progress on home cards
description: Show X% complete on project cards. PRD §6.1

title: Plan path resolution for tasks
description: Orchestrator: resolve parent epic to get plan path; task.description is spec not path. GAP_ANALYSIS §5.2
close_reason: Plan path resolution: resolve parent epic for plan path; task.description is spec not path. Fixed orchestrator and concurrent-orchestrator.

title: Completed work artifacts in Build
description: Expose archived sessions (output log, artifacts) for done tasks in Build tab. PRD §7.3.4
close_reason: Implemented archived sessions (output log, artifacts) for done tasks in Build tab. PRD §7.3.4

title: agent.completed handling in frontend
description: Refresh task list and show completion state when agent.completed received. PRD §11.2
close_reason: Implemented agent.completed handling: refresh task list, refresh build status, show completion state in agent output panel when viewing completed task

title: Test results in Build tab
description: Display test pass/fail alongside task status. PRD §8.3
close_reason: Complete opensprint.dev-iuk.26: Test results in Build tab

title: HIL escalation on retry limit
description: When retry limit reached, escalate per HIL config instead of just failing. PRD §9.1
close_reason: Implemented HIL escalation on retry limit per PRD §9.1

title: Plan AI decomposition
description: Planning agent analyzes PRD and suggests feature breakdown. Create plans + tasks from AI. PRD §7.2.2

title: Living PRD on Ship
description: When plan ships, invoke planning agent to review Plan vs PRD and update affected sections. PRD §15.1

title: Dependency graph visualization
description: Render plan dependencies (D3/vis.js). Backend returns getDependencyGraph; frontend has placeholder. PRD §7.2.2

title: Plan sidebar chat
description: Conversational refinement of individual plans in sidebar. PRD §7.2.4

title: Re-ship button
description: Show Re-ship on complete plans; wire to reship API. PRD §7.2.4

title: Build: swimlanes by epic
description: Group kanban tasks by Plan epic. PRD §7.3.4

title: Build: task detail panel
description: Full task spec, live agent output, completed artifacts. PRD §7.3.4

title: Project Setup Wizard - full backend flow
description: Complete the project setup wizard backend: git repo initialization, bd init, .opensprint directory creation, settings persistence, global project index management. See PRD Section 6.
close_reason: Complete project setup wizard backend: git init, bd init, .opensprint dir, settings, global index. Added validation, description persistence, error handling, tests.

title: Implement Build Phase - Orchestrator + Agent CLI
description: Build the orchestrator loop: poll bd ready, assign tasks, create branches, assemble prompt context, spawn agent CLI, stream output via WebSocket, handle result.json, two-agent coding/review cycle, retry logic. See PRD Sections 7.3, 12.
close_reason: Complete opensprint.dev-nl2: Implement Build Phase - Orchestrator + Agent CLI

title: Instrument ChatService (Design phase) with agent registry
description: In ChatService.sendMessage(): call ActiveAgentsService.register() before agentClient.invoke(), unregister() in finally block. Phase: design, label: 'Design chat'.

title: Integrate Build orchestrator with ActiveAgentsService
description: OrchestratorService and ConcurrentOrchestrator: register coding/review agents when spawned, unregister when process exits. Ensures Build agents appear in unified list.

title: Implement Design Phase - Chat + PRD integration
description: Wire up the Design phase: integrate the planning agent via configured CLI/API, enable conversational PRD creation, live PRD updates from chat, PRD section-level versioning. See PRD Section 7.1.
close_reason: Implemented Design Phase: planning agent integration, conversational PRD creation, live PRD updates from chat, PRD section-level versioning, WebSocket prd.updated subscription

title: ActiveAgentsService - central registry for in-flight agent invocations
description: Create ActiveAgentsService with register(), unregister(), list(projectId?) methods. Maintains Map of active agents with id, projectId, phase, label, startedAt. Used by all phases.

title: Instrument FeedbackService (Validate phase) with agent registry
description: In FeedbackService.categorizeFeedback(): register at start, unregister when done (success or catch). Phase: validate, label: 'Feedback categorization'.

title: Beads output transformation layer
description: Create a transformation layer that maps raw beads CLI JSON output (BeadsIssue) to full Task types with computed kanbanColumn, dependencies, epicId. This is needed before Build phase can work properly.
close_reason: Implemented transformation layer: BeadsIssue → Task mapping with kanbanColumn computation, field name normalization (issue_type→type, owner→assignee), epicId extraction from hierarchical IDs, and parallel bd ready fetching for ready vs backlog distinction.

title: WebSocket events agent.started and agent.completed
description: Emit agent.started when registering, agent.completed when unregistering. Broadcast to project so UI updates in real-time.
